Title: WP7 Pushpin Clusterer
Description: WP7 pushpin clusterer is a project that makes clustering pushpins on the bing maps control in your Windows Phone app easy.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WP7 pushpin clusterer is a project that makes clustering pushpins on the bing maps control in your Windows Phone app easy.

The pushpin clustering part is based on the Pushpin Clustering with the Windows Phone 7 Bing Map control blog post by Colin Eberhardt. This project is adding some value to this approach by making it more generic so you can use it in your WP7 app without alot of code changes.
